anya-e1102n5:1_0: Idāni sappurisāti dullabhāti imassa saṁvaṇṇanākkamo sampatto tathā hi loke sappurisāpi
anya-e1102n5:1_1: atidullabhāyeva. Sappurisāti kalyāṇaguṇasampannā uttamapurisā. Te nissāya jātidhammā
anya-e1102n5:1_2: sattā jātiyā, maraṇadhammā sattā maraṇato muccanti vuttañhetaṁ bhagavatā “mamañhi
anya-e1102n5:1_3: ānanda kalyāṇamittaṁ āgamma jātiyā parimuccanti, jarādhammā sattā jarāya muccantī”ti
anya-e1102n5:1_4: ādi vacanato pana sammāsambuddhoyeva sabbākārasampanno kalyāṇamitto nāma. Taṁ alabhantena
anya-e1102n5:1_5: sāriputtamoggalānādayo ariyapuggalā vā. Tepi alabhantena ekantajahitaṁ sivaṭṭhikaṁ
anya-e1102n5:4_0: Evamādiguṇasamannāgato vaḍḍhipakkhe ṭhitapaṇḍitapuggalo loke dullabhova. Katamo paṇḍitapuggalo
anya-e1102n5:4_1: buddhapaccekabuddhā asīti ca mahāsāvakā aññe ca tathāgatassa sāvakā sunettamahāgovindavidhurasarabhaṅgamahosadhasutasomanimirājaayogharakumāraka
anya-e1102n5:4_2: akattipaṇḍitādayo ca paṇḍitāti veditabbā. Te bhaye viya rakkhā, andhakāre viya padīpā,
anya-e1102n5:4_4: honti tathā hi tathāgataṁ āgamma asaṅkhyeyyā aparimāṇā devamanussā āsavakkhayaṁ pattā
anya-e1102n5:4_5: brahmaloke patiṭṭhitā, devaloke uppannā. Sāriputtatthere cittaṁ pasādetvā catūhi
anya-e1102n5:4_6: ca paccayehi theraṁ upaṭṭhahitvā asīti kusalahassāni sagge nibbattāni, tathā mahāmoggalānamahākassapapabhuti
anya-e1102n5:4_7: sunettassa satthuno sāvakā appekacce brahmaloke upapajjiṁsu, appekacce paranimmitavasavattīnaṁ
anya-e1102n5:4_8: devānaṁ sahabyataṁ…pe… appekacce gahapatimahāsālakulānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjiṁsu,
anya-e1102n5:4_9: vuttañhetaṁ “natthi bhikkhave paṇḍitato bhayaṁ, natthi paṇḍitato upaddavo, natthi
anya-e1102n5:7: Akittipaṇḍito sakkena devānamindena vare diyyamāne evamāha
anya-e1102n5:8: “Dhīraṁ passe suṇe dhīraṁ, dhīrena saha saṁvase;
anya-e1102n5:10: Kiṁ nu te akaraṁ dhīro, vada kassapa kāraṇaṁ;
anya-e1102n5:12: Nayaṁ nayati medhāvī, adurāyaṁ na yuñjati;
anya-e1102n5:13: Sanaro seyyaso hoti, sammā vutto na kuppati;
anya-e1102n5:14: Vinayaṁ so pajānāti, sādhu tena samāgamo”ti.
anya-e1102n5:15: Apica tepi sappurise saṅgamma assutapubbampi ubhayalokahitāvahaṁ vācaṁ suyyateva, vuttampi cetaṁ.
anya-e1102n5:16: “Subhāsitaṁ uttamamāhu santo, dhammaṁ bhaṇe nādhammaṁ taṁ dutiyaṁ;
anya-e1102n5:17: Piyaṁ bhaṇe nāppiyaṁ taṁ tatiyaṁ, saccaṁ bhaṇe nālīkaṁ taṁ catuttha”nti ca.
anya-e1102n5:20_1: vuttañhetaṁ “apica nerayikādidukkhaparittāṇato puññāni eva pāṇīnaṁ bahūpakārāni,
anya-e1102n5:20_3: honti vuttañhetaṁ bhagavatā, “dve me bhikkhave puggalā dullabhā lokasmiṁ, katame
anya-e1102n5:20_4: dve, yo ca pubbakārī, yo ca kataññu katavedī”ti. Apica vidhuramahosadhajātakādikālepi
anya-e1102n5:20_5: idhalokaparalokasampattiatthameva attano vacanakare sammā yojenti. Anākulakammantādhiṭṭhānena
anya-e1102n5:20_7: akusalādīhi rahitakasigorakkhavāṇijjādayo kammantā, ete attano vā puttadārassa vā
anya-e1102n5:20_8: dāsakammakarānaṁ vā byattatāya evaṁ payojitā diṭṭheva dhamme dhanadhaññavitti paṭilābhahetū
anya-e1102n5:21: Patirūpakārīri dhuravā, uṭṭhānatā vindate dhananti ca;
anya-e1102n5:26: Yo ca sītañca uṇhañca; Tiṇāni yo na maññati;
anya-e1102n5:27: Sappurisakiccāni, so sukhaṁ na vihāyatī”ti ca.
anya-e1102n5:30_0: Evamādippabhedā sappurisā loke atidullabhāva. Tabbigamena duppurisā bālajanā agavesantopi
anya-e1102n5:30_1: labbhanteva te bālā attānaṁ sevamāne parajane saṁsāradukkheyeva osīdenti bhavato
anya-e1102n5:30_2: vuṭṭhānaṁ na denti tathā hi pūraṇakassapādayo chasatthārā devadattakokālika-modakatissa
anya-e1102n5:30_4: ime aññe ca evarūpā sattā bālā aggipadittamiva agāraṁ attanā duggahitena attānañca
anya-e1102n5:30_5: attano vacanakārake ca vināsenti tathā hi devadattamāgamma rājā ajātasattu-kokālikādayo
anya-e1102n5:30_6: tadaññepi puggalā apāye nibbattanti. Rājā ajātasattu sāmaññaphalasuttantasavanakāle
anya-e1102n5:30_7: yadi pitaraṁ aghāteyya, sotāpanno bhaveyya pitaraṁ ghātitattā maggaphalampi appatvā
anya-e1102n5:30_8: lohakumbhiyaṁ saṭṭhivassasahassāni paccitvā muccissati anāgatepi paccekabuddho bhavissati.
anya-e1102n5:30_9: Kokālikopi sāriputtamoggalānatthere anapacāyitvā mahāniraye padumagaṇanāya paccanokāse
anya-e1102n5:30_10: nirayapadese padumaniraye…pe… padumaṁ kho pana aññataro bhikkhu nirayaṁ kokāliko
anya-e1102n5:30_11: bhikkhu upapanno sāriputtamoggalānesu cittaṁ āghātetvā”ti āha. Tattha aññataro bhikkhūti
anya-e1102n5:30_12: nāmagottena apākaṭaṁ “kiṁ va dīghaṁ nukho bhante padume niraye āyuppamāṇa”nti pañhaṁ
anya-e1102n5:30_13: pucchitvā nisinnaṁ ekaṁ bhikkhuṁ evamāha “dīghaṁ kho bhikkhu niraye āyuppamāṇaṁ,
anya-e1102n5:30_14: taṁ na sukaraṁ saṅkhātuṁ ettakāni vassānīti vā ettakāni vassasatānīti vā ettakāni
anya-e1102n5:30_15: vassasahassānīti vā ettakāni vassasatasahassānī”ti vā sakkā pana bhante upamaṁ kātunti.
anya-e1102n5:30_16: “Sakkā bhikkhū”ti bhagavā avoca. Seyyathāpi bhikkhu vīsatikhāriko kosalako tilavāho
anya-e1102n5:30_17: hoti, tato puriso vassasatassa vassasahassassa accayena ekamekaṁ tilaṁ uddhareyya,
anya-e1102n5:30_18: khippataraṁ kho so bhikkhu vīsatikhāriko kosalako tilavāho iminā upakkamena parikkhayaṁ
anya-e1102n5:30_19: pariyādānaṁ gaccheyya, na tveva eko abbudo nirayo. Seyyathāpi bhikkhu vīsa abbudo
anya-e1102n5:30_20: nirayo, evameko nirabbudo nirayo”ti ādi. Vīsatikhāriko ti māgadhikena patthena cattāro
anya-e1102n5:30_21: patthā kosalaraṭṭhe eko pattho hoti. Tena patthena cattāro patthā āḷhakaṁ. Cattāri
anya-e1102n5:30_22: āḷhakāni doṇaṁ. Catudoṇā mānikā. Catumānikā khārī. Tāyakhāriyā vīsatikhāriko tilavāho.
anya-e1102n5:30_23: Tilavāhoti tilasakaṭaṁ. Abbudo nirayoti abbudo nāma eko paccekanirayo natthi, avīcimhi
anya-e1102n5:30_24: eva pana abbudagaṇanāya paccanokāso “abbudo nirayo”ti vutto. Esa nayo nirabbudādīsupi.
anya-e1102n5:30_25: Tattha vassagaṇanāpi evaṁ veditabbā yathāha “sataṁsatasahassāni koṭi hoti evaṁ sataṁsahassakoṭiyo
anya-e1102n5:30_26: pakoṭi nāma. Sataṁsatasahassapakoṭiyo koṭipakoṭi nāma. Sataṁ satasahassakoṭipakoṭiyo
anya-e1102n5:30_27: nahutaṁ. Sataṁsatasahassanahutāni ninnahutaṁ. Sataṁsatasahassaninnahutāni eko abbudo.
anya-e1102n5:30_28: Tato vīsatiguṇo nirabbudo. Esa nayo sabbattha ayañca gaṇanā aparicitānaṁ dukkarā”ti
anya-e1102n5:30_29: vuttaṁ taṁ na sukaraṁ saṅkhātu’nti keci pana tattha paridevanānattenapi kammakaraṇanānattenapi
anya-e1102n5:30_30: imāni nāmāni laddhānīti vadanti. Aparepi vānakāraṇehīti ṭīkānetti. Yathā ca dīghavidassaāghātā
anya-e1102n5:30_31: ca buddhantaraṁ saṭṭhiyojanamattena attabhāvena uttāno patito mahāniraye paccati
anya-e1102n5:30_32: yathā ca, tassa diṭṭhiabhirucitāni pañca kulasatāni tasseva sahabyataṁ uppannāni
anya-e1102n5:30_33: mahāniraye paccanti. Vuttañcetaṁ bhagavatā “seyyathāpi bhikkhave naḷāgāraṁ vā tiṇāgāraṁ
anya-e1102n5:30_34: vā aggiphuṭṭho kūṭāgārāni dahati ullittāvalittāni nivātāni phusitaggaḷāni pihita
anya-e1102n5:30_35: vātapānāni evameva kho bhikkhave yānikānici bhayāni uppajjanti, sabbāni bālato uppajjanti,
anya-e1102n5:30_36: no paṇḍitato yekeci upaddavā uppajjanti, no paṇḍitato, yekeci upasaggā…pe… no paṇḍitato.
anya-e1102n5:30_37: Iti kho bhikkhave sappaṭibhayo bālo appaṭibhayo paṇḍito saupaddavo bālo anupaddavo
anya-e1102n5:30_38: paṇḍito, saupasaggo bālo anupasaggo paṇḍitoti. Api ca pūtimacchasadiso bālo, pūtimacchabaddhapatta
anya-e1102n5:30_39: putisadiso hoti tadupasevī. Chaḍḍanīyataṁ jigucchanīyatañca āpajjati viññūnaṁ vuttampi cetaṁ nāradajātake.
anya-e1102n5:33: Akattipaṇḍitocāpi sakkena devānamindena vare diyyamāne evamāha
anya-e1102n5:34: “Bālaṁ na passe na suṇe, na ca bālena saṁvase;
anya-e1102n5:35: Bālenā’llāpasallāpaṁ, na kare na ca rocaye.
anya-e1102n5:36: Kiṁnu te akaraṁ bālo, vada kassapa kāraṇaṁ;
anya-e1102n5:39: Dunnayo seyyaso hoti, sammā vutto pakuppati;
anya-e1102n5:40: Vinayaṁ so na jānāti, sādhu tassa adassana”nti.
anya-e1102n5:41: Evaṁ bāladujjanasaṁsaggavaseneva sabbāni bhayupaddavāni uppajjanti, no paṇḍitasevanavasenātisabbaso sappurisā atidullabhāva.
anya-e1102n5:45_0: Imissā gāthāya vaṇṇanākkamo sampatto. Tattha dullabhañca manussattanti manussabhāvopi
anya-e1102n5:45_1: dullabhoyeva manussassa dullabhabhāvo kāṇakacchapopamādīhi veditabbo eko kira kassako
anya-e1102n5:45_2: gaṅgātīre tīṇi saṁvaccharāni kasitvā kiñcimattampi alabhitvā naṅgalaphālaṁ dvedhā
anya-e1102n5:45_3: bhinditvā gaṅgāyaṁ khipi tena gaṅgānadiyā vāhena eko uddhaṁ eko heṭṭhāti evaṁ dve
anya-e1102n5:45_4: naṅgalaphālakā gaṅgāyaṁ vuyhantā cirena eko uddhaṁ eko heṭṭhāti dve ekato hutvā pākatikā
anya-e1102n5:45_5: yujjanti tasmiṁ khaṇe vassasatavassasahassaccayena ekavāraṁ ummujjamāno kāṇakacchapo
anya-e1102n5:45_6: ummujjamānakkhaṇe tassa gīvā dvinnaṁ naṅgalaphālānamantare hoti ayaṁ kālo dullabhova
anya-e1102n5:45_7: evameva manussattabhāvopi dullabhoyeva tathāhi manussattabhāvaṁ alabhitvāva nirayapetaasurakāyatiracchānabhūmīsuyeva
anya-e1102n5:45_8: saṁsaritvā sīsampi ukkhipituṁ alabhantā ekabuddhantarā dve buddhantarā tayo buddhantarā
anya-e1102n5:45_9: cattāro buddhantarā ekāsaṅkhyeyyavasena niraye paccanakasattānaṁ gaṇanapathaṁ vītivattā,
anya-e1102n5:45_12: nisinnānaṁ atikhuddakasattānaṁ gaṇanapathampi vītivattā te hi gaṇituṁ iddhimantapuggale
anya-e1102n5:45_13: ṭhapetvā añño ko nāma sakkhissati tehi mohandhabhāvena kaṇhasukkapakkhampi ajānantā
anya-e1102n5:45_14: anekesu buddhasatesu vā buddhasahassesu vā uppajjamānesupi buddhotisaddaṁ asutvā
anya-e1102n5:45_15: vītivattā, evaṁ manussattabhāvopi dullabhoyeva. Manussattabhāve labhamānepi buddhuppādakālo
anya-e1102n5:45_16: atidullabhova. Buddhuppādakālepi sammādiṭṭhi hutvā kusalūpapattisaṅkhātā khaṇasampatti
anya-e1102n5:45_17: dullabhāva, saddhammadesakassāpi dullabhattā, tasmimpi sati aṅgavikalabhāvena saddhammasavanassāpi
anya-e1102n5:45_18: dullabhattāti evamādippabhedā manussattabhāvādikā khaṇasampattiyo dullabhāti veditabbā.
anya-e1102n5:45_19: Dullabhā khaṇasampattīti kusalūpapattisaṅkhātā khaṇasampatti dullabhāyeva tathā hi
anya-e1102n5:45_21: paripuṇṇaaṅgabhāvepi micchādiṭṭhibhūtā vā kusalūpapattisaṅkhātā khaṇā na honti paccantavisaye
anya-e1102n5:45_22: hi pavattā janā pāṇātipātādidasaakusalakammapatheyeva ramanti abhiramanti, caṇḍasabhāvā
anya-e1102n5:45_23: ca te honti, ratanattayaguṇampi na jānanti. Arūpinopi puggalā paratoghosavirahitattā
anya-e1102n5:45_24: sotāpattimaggapaṭilābhopi tesaṁ natthi, buddhadassanādīnipi na labhanti. Asaññasattatiracchānapetanerayikakālesu
anya-e1102n5:45_25: pana pageva pūritapāramīnaṁ sattānaṁ pavattanampi abbohārikaṁ, sammādiṭṭhikule jāyamānāpi
anya-e1102n5:45_26: cakkhuvikalena buddhasaṅgharatanānaṁ adassanaṁ, sotavikalena dhammasavanatopi hāyati
anya-e1102n5:45_27: eḷamūgādibhāvena kusalasamādānā na honti. Aṅgasampannepi micchādiṭṭhibhāvena dvattiṁsamahāpurisalakkhaṇaasītianubyañjanabyāmappabhāparikkhittaṁ
anya-e1102n5:45_28: sabbajanānaṁ nayanarasāyatanabhūtaṁ sabbaññubuddhampi disvā pasādasommena cakkhunā
anya-e1102n5:45_29: oloketabbampi na maññanti manopadosavaseneva yugaggāhā hutvā yamakapāṭihāriyakālādīsu
anya-e1102n5:45_30: anekepi micchādiṭṭhino mahāniraye uppajjanti. Evaṁ kusalūpapattikhaṇasampattipi dullabhāyeva.
anya-e1102n5:51_0: Evaṁ satthuparinibbānato vassasataccayena patiṭṭhite isinā kāritattā’ isinagara’nti
anya-e1102n5:51_1: laddhanāme dvattapādibhūpālānaṁ nivāsaṭṭhānabhūte sīrikhettanagare erāvatiyā nadiyā
anya-e1102n5:51_2: pārimatīrabhūte pabbatasānumhi patiṭṭhitassa kañcanavaramahāthūpassa dāyakassa satvivamahādhammarañño
anya-e1102n5:51_3: kāle sāsanassa dvisahassasatādhikaekatiṁsatime vasse sāsane paṭiladdhasaddhānaṁ kulaputtānaṁ
anya-e1102n5:51_5: avicinitvā nadiyā udakukkhepaṁ akatvā upasampadā kammassa kāritattā sāsane parājayamāpanne
anya-e1102n5:51_6: kulaputte upārambhakaraṇavasena sīmavipattihārako sīmasampattippakāsako gantho pavattati.
anya-e1102n5:52_1: tipiṭakadharena’saddhammakovido’ti pākaṭa nāmadheyyena mahātherena upajjhāyo hutvā
anya-e1102n5:52_3: vinayadharena mahāsāminā ca, rājagurunā tipiṭakanāgattherena ca ācariyo hutvā vejjakammajaṅghapesanakammādivasena
anya-e1102n5:52_4: anesanaṁ pahāya sammā ājīvena visuddhājīvehi saṅghagaṇehi kārakasaṅghā hutvā sirikhettanagarassa
anya-e1102n5:52_5: dakkhiṇadisābhāge dīghapabbatasānumhi erāvatiyā nadiyā tīre vālikapuḷine sīmāpekkhāya
anya-e1102n5:52_6: saha udakukkhepaṁ katvā pavattāya udakukkhepasīmāya dasadhā byañjanavipattiṁ akatvā
anya-e1102n5:52_7: ṭhānārahena ñatticatutthena kammena upasampadāya vīsativassena sāgarabuddhīti garūhi
anya-e1102n5:52_8: gahitanāmadheyyena bhikkhunā racito sāsanavipattihārako sīmavisodhanī nāma gantho samatto.
anya-e1102n5:60: Evaṁ pāṇinaṁ sabbe, sīghaṁ sijjhantu saṅkappā.
anya-e1102n5:62: Tāva tiṭṭhatu yaṁ gantho, sāsane hārayaṁ tamaṁ.
anya-e1102n5:63: Uddhaṁ yāva bhavaggā ca, adho yāva avīcito;
anya-e1102n5:66: Ciraṁ jīvatu no rājā, sāsanassa ujjotako.
